snippet.title: RPG Destiny Fantasia - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
©2013 WorldWideSoftware published by KEMCO

'RPG Destiny Fantasia' is now available for Android/iOS!
Set off on a journey to prevent the end of the world!

Download it now on
App Store:
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id702784898?mt=8
Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.wws.destinyfantasia


The tyranny of the Epsilom Empire has destroyed Lidim's hometown. Through an encounter with two mysterious girls, Lidim decides to set off on a journey to prevent the disaster from happening again and to find out the truth of why his village was destroyed. However, even bigger secret is lurking behind all these disasters happening around...

This game features:
- Extensive Story (20+ hours of gameplay)
- Engaging Character Development
- Addictive Side Quests (e.g. Battle Arena)
- Additional Scenarios and Dungeons through IAP

※All graphics terms, characters and elements are subject to change in the actual product.
